title: Export a Google Sheet as a minimal HTML table
description: Open a Sheet and add the file_id and gid of a tab to this handy URL: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/<FILE_ID>/gviz/tq?tqx=out:html&tq&gid=<TAB_GID>
